p: In Pakistan, parallel water supply and sewage pipes currently lead to cross contamination and corrosion. In China, the situation is somehow similar to Pakistan where water pollution control, cross contamination between aquifers, and failure of the pipe network construction are the main concerns [ 14]. The public in Pakistan is unaware of pollutants such as iron, nitrates, and sulphates. Similarly, in Iran, 71% of the public are unaware of nitrates and 78% of people are largely ignorant of its corresponding health hazards [ 79].
